X.i.6.F.2.a
.
Responsible Provider for IDES Examinations
IDES claims processors will only utilize appropriate examination facilities whose providers are responsible for conducting IDES examinations, including military treatment facilities (MTFs).
Important
:  When informed by an appropriate examination facility that an examination request involves an examination site employee or employee’s family member, cancel the request and submit another request using a different, appropriate, examination facility with a note providing justification.
Reference
:  For more information on appropriate examination facilities, see
M21-1, Part IV, Subpart i, 2.A.1.b
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 6, Section F - Integrated Disability Evaluation System (IDES) Development and Examinations
citation: Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 6, Section F
